Metadata.title: Starry Ciel
Metadata.description: StarryCiels is Game NFT Fully on-chain 100% on Solana, an enchanting exploration and adventure game set in a vast, fantastical universe filled with stars and celestial wonders. Players control the colony as they journey through diverse realms amidst a galaxy of stars and cosmic clouds.
